entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
